name: Pong (itch) (dangerking28)
description:
This is the Pong. Enjoy playing with family and friends. Discover the new theme based pong, which will be updated regularly, currently it has two Them (Classic and Winter). Chill with your friends while playing.

How To Play:
  • Step 1: Call your friend and ask him to compete with you.
  • Step 2: Choose the Player you want to play.
  • Step 3: Player 1 will move by Pressing ( W and D )
  • Step 4: Player 2 will move by Pressing ( Up Arrow and Down Arrow)
  • Step 4: Enjoy:)
